name: Canva AI
description: Canva's AI features help you create stunning designs with text-to-image generation, Magic Eraser, and instant design suggestions.
about: Canva AI brings powerful artificial intelligence features to the popular design platform. Create custom images with Text to Image, remove backgrounds instantly, expand images beyond their borders, and get design suggestions tailored to your needs. Perfect for both beginners and professional designers.

seo.metaDescription: Canva AI brings magic to design with AI-powered tools for image generation, editing, and content creation.
